passwordDescription: Ensure your account is using a long, random password to stay secure.
name: Name
clickResend: Click here to resend the verification email.
newVerificationLink: A new verification link has been sent to your email address.
youHaveNotEnable: You have not enabled two-factor authentication.
verificationDescription: Add an extra layer of security to your account using two-factor authentication.
toFinish: To finish enabling two-factor authentication, please scan the following QR code.
scanCode: Scan the following QR code to configure your app.
iniciadoSesion: You are logged in on the following devices:
cerrarSesion: Log out of other browser sessions
confirmLogOut: Please enter your password to confirm you would like to log out of your other browser sessions.
areYouSure: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
onceDeleted: Once your account is deleted, all of its resources and data will be permanently deleted.
